Job Description: Job Description     Contribute to all phases of the software development life cycle.   Basic programming knowledge of Java, Python, C++, Javascript.  OOP knowledge, frameworks like Spring, databases MySQL, web application development skills preferred but not mandatory.     Required Candidate Profile     Candidate should have good analytical and problem-solving skills.    Fast learner and desire to learn new technologies to keep up with market trends and implement cutting edge technologies in the work environment.   Team player and hard worker.
